TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ListSelectionMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Especifica o modo de seleção do controle .

remarks.format:
## Remarks O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListSelectionMode> enumeração representa o modo de seleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> controle que determina se um usuário pode selecionar vários itens ou apenas um único item.
## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/CS/listitemcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/VB/listitemcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/CS/listitemcollectioncs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/VB/listitemcollectionvb.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListSelectionMode Multiple = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Modo de seleção de vários itens.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListSelectionMode Single = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Modo de seleção de item único.
